column4: how do I remove a service from starting on boot, like rc-update in gentoo? is there something better than chmod -x the init script?
if you're running 9.10 it's now controlled by Upstart (which doesn't seem to be too well documented at this point) - there was a GUI app for doing this in 9.04 and less
you might want to ask in #ubuntu-server then, good luck
